description: Details required by condition 3 (New flooring construction, comprising drawings of a scale of at least 1:10, and showing typical details both where original floorboards are present and where they are no longer pre sent; (a) the new finish to the staircase; where underfloor heating is to be installed; and the interaction of new flooring with any surviving original skirtings, which should be retained in situ. (b) In elevation, the new double opening between kitchen and dining room. (c) Details of all new joinery, including drawings at a scale of at least 1:5 showing sections and elevations, and including new doors, architraves, skirtings, fitted cupboards, air conditioning cabinets, new coal store door and shutters. (d) Details of new ceiling roses and new cornices) of listed building consent 20/00073 (Complete refurbishment and redecoration to lower and upper ground, first, second and third floors; renovations to front and rear garden areas. Replacement of non-original fixtures throughout, replacing for correct period designs. Reconfiguration to lower ground floor  to accommodate a utility room. Replacement of hardwood flooring throughout. Creation of an opening between the upper ground level kitchen and dining room area. Upgrades to AC/heating, electrical and AV systems throughout. Installation of a kitchen, bathrooms and shower room fit-outs. Repair and making good of central staircase. Restoration of original sash windows and external doors.)
